formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'While' =-
[Synopsis] Start a while loop
[Description] Usage: While(<expr>) Start a While Loop. Execution will return to this point when EndWhile is called until expr is no longer true.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -1,7 +1,7 @@ -= Info about application 'While' =-
[Synopsis] - Start A While Loop + Start a while loop
[Description] Usage: While(<expr>)

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,5 @@ Start a while loop
[Description] - Usage: While(<expr>) - Start a While Loop. Execution will return to this point when - EndWhile is called until expr is no longer true. + While(<expr>): Start a While Loop. Execution will return to this + point when EndWhile() is called until expr is no longer true.
